commitResults.messageBody: Create chatbot

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task class, add mark/unmark class, rewrite printing
Add AmiaException and improve input validation
commitResults.messageBody: Also update tests

commitResults.messageTitle: Add CommandType enum and refactor command handling
Add toFileString and make Task abstract
commitResults.messageBody:
Make Task abstract and add an abstract toFileString() method for file serialization.

Implement toFileString() in ToDo, Deadline, and Event to produce pipe-separated representations (e.g. `T | 0 | description`, `D | 0 | description | by`, `E | 0 | description | from | to`).

* Introduce Storage.java to load/save tasks to ./data/amia.txt and persist task state.
* Update Amia.java to load tasks on start and call Storage.save(...) after add/remove/mark/undone operations with basic AmiaException handling.
* Update .gitignore to ignore the data/ directory.
Change Deadline and Event to store date/time as LocalDateTime and validate input.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Ui class and refactor Amia I/O
commitResults.messageBody: Introduce a new Ui class to centralize input/output and replace direct Scanner/System.out usage in Amia.
Change Storage from a static utility to an instance-based class with a configurable file path.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Parser utility and refactor Amia
commitResults.messageBody: Introduce a new Parser class to centralize command parsing logic.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add TaskList class and implement in Amia

commitResults.messageBody: Refactor Amia and TaskList to centralize index validation as validateIndex().

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug regarding loading and saving times
commitResults.messageBody: Persist task date/time fields using DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_DATE_TIME.
Classes were relocated into amia, amia.exception, amia.parser, amia.storage, amia.task, and amia.ui packages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Enable Checkstyle, Java 17, update main class
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add Checkstyle plugin and placeholder config files, set Checkstyle toolVersion to 11.0.0, and configure Java toolchain to use Java 17.
- Update application main class from seedu.duke.Duke to amia.Amia.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add unit tests for Parser and TaskList
commitResults.messageBody: Introduce ParserTest and TaskListTest JUnit 5 tests. ParserTest verifies parseCommandType, extractDescription, and parseIndex (including invalid input error). TaskListTest covers adding/removing tasks and markDone/markUndone behavior, asserting size and task string state. Tests use AmiaException for error cases.

Apply code formatting and minor cleanups across the project: remove unused imports, normalize DateTimeFormatter declarations to single-line, fix indentation/spacing, wrap long lines for readability, and remove stray trailing whitespace. Affects Amia.java, AmiaException.java, Storage.java, Deadline.java, Event.java, Task.java, TaskList.java, and ToDo.java. No functional behavior changes.
Change default archiveBaseName.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Javadoc to core classes and methods
Encapsulate Parser info fields; use getters
commitResults.messageBody: Make MAX_TASKS and FILE_PATH constants final and encapsulate Parser.DeadlineInfo/EventInfo fields by changing them to private and adding getters. Update Amia to use the new getters when constructing Deadline and Event objects. Improves immutability and encapsulation of parser data.

Change Deadline.by visibility from protected to private to improve encapsulation. Replace java.io.* wildcard import in Storage with explicit io imports for clarity. Reorder Event's from/to field declarations (no behavior change) for consistency and formatting.

commit 8c512f4512adc553a20f4aceb14bea36461c88cd
Author: underscoregt <gabriel.jiaxu@gmail.com>
Date:   Sat Feb 14 07:11:53 2026 +0800

    Add 'find' command and task matching

    Implement a searchable 'find' command: add FIND to CommandType, handle FIND in Amia command dispatch, and add Amia.findTask to search tasks by keyword.
This reverts commit 78c5104b3eed6564a90b93b7e94bfe61b519aed3.
This reverts commit 07181ee82948c06d84cd0eaa9b9a2557f07c07ec.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix merge errors, add Javadoc to findTask
Introduce Command classes and refactor Amia
commitResults.messageBody: Add a Command abstraction and concrete command implementations (Add, Delete, Mark, Unmark, List, Find, Exit, Unknown) to encapsulate command behavior and return response strings. Refactor Amia from a static CLI-style class into an instance-based class that parses input into Command objects (parseCommand), executes them, and exposes getResponse/shouldExit for GUI integration; main now instantiates Amia and runs start/loop/exit. Move task-limit logic into AddCommand, add Task.matches, and adjust Storage/Parser/CommandType with small API/doc updates (parseIndex, parseDeadline, parseEvent). Update tests to use JUnit Assertions and minor imports. Add JavaFX dependencies in build.gradle and change application mainClass to amia.Launcher to prepare for a GUI launcher.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaFX GUI components and resources
commitResults.messageBody: Introduce a JavaFX-based UI for Amia: adds Main application and Launcher (classpath workaround), MainWindow controller, and DialogBox custom control. Includes FXML layouts (MainWindow.fxml, DialogBox.fxml) and avatar images (Amia.jpg, User.png). MainWindow wires Amia into the UI, binds scrolling, handles user input to display paired dialog boxes, and schedules app exit on Amia's exit command.

Remove hardcoded FILE_PATH from Amia and let Storage compute its default path when given null/empty. Amia now constructs Storage(null). Storage was updated to use getDefaultFilePath(), which determines a data/amia.txt path relative to the running JAR directory via the class ProtectionDomain (with a URISyntaxException fallback to ./data/amia.txt). Updated constructor docs and added necessary import.
